label: 惣社
説明文: Also read sōja. The general definition of sōja is an amalgamated shine in the provincial headquarters or its vicinity where deities from shrines throughout the province were honored. In this context, it specifies the site at Rengeō’in where deities from major shrines all over the realm were enshrined.  Source: Hyakurenshō, 27th Day, 5th Month, Angen 1 (1175). [蓮華王院、百錬抄]
